attributes.action: Allow UK Citizens to choose to be individual members of the EU despite Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: In otherwords, the country may choose to leave, but as individuals who like the EU, we can pay a fee to preserve our personal membership and the rights that stem from that such as freedom of movement, the social chapter and so on.
attributes.background: Following on from the EU Referendum, why not allow everyone who chose to remain the option of having their EU citizenship, rights and privileges via an opt-in with associated subscription fee regardless of what the country, as a whole, may do, thus allowing each to remain or leave as individuals?
